question_text: In a cross-platform environment, which issue might arise if a printer only supports LPD and IPP but not SMB?
answer_options: Mac clients will be unable to detect the printer
Print jobs will be delivered to the wrong queue
Windows clients may be unable to send print jobs using native tools
The printer will not support duplex printing
correct_answer: Windows clients may be unable to send print jobs using native tools
explanation: Without SMB support, native Windows print utilities may not detect or communicate with the printer unless configured manually via alternate protocols like IPP or LPD.
